pullrequest.title: Change the number of copies that IntrospectionManager has to make

content.raw:
I updated this to restore some of the sanity checks that are still going to be required \(I somehow thought that they wouldn’t be\).

Now it should only be making a copy of items that are being observed/filtered in the `IntrospectionManager`, which should reduce some of the copies needed.
content.html:
I updated this to restore some of the sanity checks that are still going to be required (I somehow thought that they wouldn’t be).

Now it should only be making a copy of items that are being observed/filtered in the IntrospectionManager, which should reduce some of the copies needed.
